title: Pizza Hut: Don't Eat Basic
label: MRY 2014 Intern Competition Team Winner
attribution: Collaboration with Alexandra Butler, Jessica Clement, Christina Hardison, Deanna Meyer, and Jacob Minkus
description:
The brief was to encourage college students to try and order Pizza Hut's new menu and flavors.

In order to achieve this our group implemented a trending phrase "basic bitch" and morphed it into our campaign concept and tagline "Don't Eat Basic". College students fear being basic and Pizza Hut's new menu is anything but that.

Also to celebrate the arrival of the new menu, Pizza Hut chains in college towns will unveil a new fun ordering process along with Pizza Hut having a nationwide food truck tour that visits college campuses and allows students to create and sample the new flavors.
